Winds:: EQ-05S, 90E-100E        : Showers or thundershowers at most places.
EQ-10S, 60E-85E          : Showers or thundershowers at several places.
Other sea areas            : Showers or thundershowers at a few places.
05S-10S, 60E-100E      : South-easterly / (30-40) kmph; gusting up to (50-60) kmph.
Other sea areas            : Slight to moderate.
